title: The provision in Regulation 37(20) relating to balcony shall apply to the URS with the following spe
clause_text: The provision in Regulation 37(20) relating to balcony shall apply to the URS with the following specifications: -Balcony shall not reduce
section: Relaxation in Building and other requirements:-
